name: enterprise
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: enterprise
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: an organization, especially a business, or a difficult and important plan, especially one that will earn money
trans_examp.trans_cn: 组织；（尤指）公司，企业；（尤指营利性的、艰巨而重大的）计划，事业

example.eg: Don't forget this is a commercial enterprise - we're here to make money.
example.egtrans: 不要忘记这是一个商业组织——我们到这儿来是为了赚钱的。

example.eg: Those were the years of private enterprise (= businesses being run privately, rather than by the government), when lots of small businesses were started.
example.egtrans: 那是一个私人企业的时代，众多小公司就是那时创建的。

example.eg: Her latest enterprise (= plan) is to climb Mount Everest.
example.egtrans: 她最近的雄伟计划是攀登珠穆朗玛峰。

dsense.name: enterprise
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: eagerness to do something new and clever, despite any risks
trans_examp.trans_cn: 事业心；进取心；创业精神；冒险精神

example.eg: They've shown a lot of enterprise in setting up this project.
example.egtrans: 启动这个项目显示出他们豪迈的进取精神。

example.eg: We need someone with enterprise and imagination to design a marketing strategy.
example.egtrans: 我们需要一位有进取心和创新精神的人来为我们制定市场战略。
